channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15801] Upgrade checkstyle for all branches
item.description: We should use the same checkstyle for all branches.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Patch for maser, upgrade checkstyle itself to 6.18.
Patch for branch-1. Can also be applied to 1.3 and 1.2.
Patch for 1.1 and 1.0.

Patch for 0.98.

A problem is that the checkstyle 6.18 requires java 7 but 0.98 should be compatible with java 6. But I think it is OK since we do not introduce any java 7 dependencies at runtime? Andrew Purtell

Thanks.
Nick Dimiduk PTAL. Thanks.

-1 overall
